mapper.select: select a.name,b.projectname,c.time,c.money,d.hktime,d.hkmoney,d.ptmoney,e.codename,f.outday ,f.outmoney from investor a,projectapplication b,invest c,repaymoney d,code e,outtime f where c.investorid = a.id and b.id = c.subjectid and d.projrctid = c.subjectid and d.statu = e.codeid and f.projrctid = c.subjectid
